name: Splitseconds
description:
Please Download or use Fullscreen Mode (Keyboard Focus needs fixing)
... and turn up your Speakers! :D
---------------------------------------------------

Push both Buttons to finish the Level.
But there is not enough time!!
If only you could split yourself!?

SPLITSECONDS
feat. Akimbo Bros.

Coding: tailoRen
Art+Sound: weilo

Made in 48hours for the miniBeansJam 7
